issue.title: [C++] Add GCS library to vcpkg.json
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14171](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14171). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I think it would be easier to understand the changes if I send a PR to include the GCS library into ThirdpartyToolchain (see ARROW-8147), and then a separate PR to include the library in the different package manager files (`vcpkg`, and `conda`).

If this turns out to be a terrible idea, can simply close this issue and do the work in a single PR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14171?focusedCommentId=17451946) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11569
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11569>
